name: Red Funnel Consulting
overview:
Red Funnel builds FatStax, a mobile selling solution for B2B sales people.

The Companies with FatStax quickly discover how it helps salespeople readily access up-to-date product information, streamline CRM updates, conduct sales-call follow ups from the field and more. Most importantly, companies see increased sales. The sales and support teams at FatStax have helped sales reps all around the world embrace the iPad. Some companies already have distributed iPads to their sales forces, and others see FatStax as a reaffirming reason to make the investment.

The FatStax sales platform is designed for enterprises and it has been maximized to run quickly and efficiently — online or offline — using the iPad. Anyone can download FatStax from the Apple App Store, but only FatStax customers can access a company’s customized, searchable product catalogs from a secure cloud server database. FatStax partners closely with companies to gather and present detailed product information, specs, supporting documentation, pdf brochures, video demos and more on the iPad.

Since salespeople around the world already use FatStax, the development team has had more than two years to refine the app according to sales reps’ desires and preferences. FatStax provides ongoing support for its customers, including catalog updates, advanced features, and customization so companies don’t have to invest in an internal mobile development team.

FatStax works closely with IT, marketing, sales and other key decision makers at companies that sell everything from pharmaceuticals to furniture. Most importantly, FatStax works closely with sales people in the field to make sure they have the product information and software integration they need to save time, sell more and boost revenue.

external_links.title: #6 ZMOT Selling Strategy, Cold Calling, & FatStax
